headline: Truist declares common and preferred stock dividends
summary: The Board of Directors of Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.52 per common share, payable on June 2, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 9, 2025.
